Help
Frequently Asked Questions
How do I order?

It's easy to order from [storeName]. If this is your first time purchasing from our store, just follow these three easy steps:

  1. Browse the catalog.
  2. Add the item you want to your shopping cart.
  3. Complete the checkout flow.

You will be asked for your e-mail address and a password to register yourself as a customer. Then, the next time you shop with us, we will have your information already stored, and you won't need to input it again.

How can I pay?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, or American Express. When you are checking out, you will be prompted to enter your credit card number for payment.

Is it safe to use my credit card?

We guarantee that every transaction you make at [storeName] will be 100 percent safe and secure. This means you pay nothing if unauthorized charges are made to your card as a result of shopping at [storeName]. If you feel more comfortable, you may enter only your cards last five digits and its expiration date. Once you have fully submitted your order, you can call us and let us know the rest of your card number over the phone.

How do I track my order?

You can review the status of any order you have placed at [storeName] simply by clicking the My account link at the top of every page. From there, you will be able to view or modify any order that has yet to enter the shipping process.

Contact Us
Contact Information

We're here to help.


For support with your order, write to us at support@[storeName].com.


If you have any questions about [storeName], or would like to provide feedback about our store or website, please contact us at questions@[storeName].com.

Return Policy
Our Policy

If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your order, simply contact customer service for instructions on how to return your order for a full refund. If and when you are ready to place another order, we will be happy to serve you again.

The following text is provided as a sample only. Do not use this text within your custom store. Replace this text with the correct content for your store. Your organization is responsible for ensuring that your legal counsel completes any required reviews of your store pages and privacy policy.

Privacy Policy

[Replace the following sample text with the privacy policy for your site.]

Personal Information

[storeName] is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. You can visit [storeName] on the Web without telling us who you are or revealing any information about yourself. When necessary, for shipping and billing purposes, your personal information is stored on a secure server. Your personal information will never be sold to a third party or used to contact you without your consent.


If you choose to give us personal information through the Internet that we may need to correspond with you or to process an order, it is our intent to let you know how we will use this information. You can contact us at any time to request a report of the personal information that we have collected and stored. If you request it, we will erase your personal information or stop using this information to contact you.


Shopping Behavior Tracking

To provide you and other shoppers with more personalized and relevant shopping experiences [storeName] can track and collect information about how you interact with our site. [storeName] uses cookies to track and collect information.


The information that is collected by [storeName] is used internally by authorize [storeName] employees for three main purposes.


First, we collect information to determine how to improve our site by seeing which areas, features and products are most popular.


Second, we collect information to personalize the site for our customers. For example, in the future, we may recommend products, promotional offers, or other features that we think you may like based on what you have purchased or viewed in the past.


Third, we keep track of the domains from which people visit us. We analyze this data for trends and statistics, and then discard the source information.


If you grant [storeName] permission to collect information about your shopping activities with our site, you can still change your decision at any time from your My Account page. If you select to no longer be tracked when shopping our site, any data that we previously collected about your interactions with our site is erased. Your account details, order history, and items added to your wish lists or shopping cart will not be erased.

About Us
Our Story

Established in 1957, [storeName] began as a small goods and services shop in New York City. Today, there are over 800 [storeName] department stores worldwide in 15 countries. [storeName] employs over 125,000 people.


What began with a commitment to high quality products at fair prices continues through to this day on [storeName].com, featuring the same brands and styles you've come to rely on in our brick and mortar stores, available at your fingertips 24 hours a day.


Take a look around, we hope you like what you see!

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide our customers with the best and most convenient online shopping experience possible. We are committed to offering products that are shipped in easy to open and sustainable packaging and accept all major credit cards.

Corporate Responsibility

[storeName] supports healthy living in every aspect of our business. From our "safer communities" initiative to our environmental sustainability project, we take pride in our responsibility to our shoppers, their diversity, their communities and their health and safety.

Contact [storeName] Corporate
[storeName] Head Office

We are personally committed to providing you with superb customer service. If you would like to contact us with a question or comment, please choose the most appropriate corporate division below for a prompt response:

Human Resources

Our Human Resource office is available Monday to Friday, 8am-5pm EST. You may contact us by email anytime at careers@[storeName].com

Consumer Relations

Our Consumer Relations office is available Wednesday to Friday, 8am-5pm EST. You may contact us by email anytime at relations@[storeName].com

Corporate Responsibility

For more information on [storeName] Corporate Responsibility, please visit the About Us page or send us a message at info@[storeName].com

Fashionable
Evening Wear

About the Designer

Award-winning designer Elise Kurkova inspires those who appreciate style, design and uncompromising quality.

"When a woman puts on my clothes, I want her to feel as if she is enjoying one of life's great luxuries."

Dresses

Hailing from St. Petersburg, Russia, Elise remembers playing dress up with her mother's old clothing, and spending hours enhancing each piece with

whatever embellishments she could find around the house.

Her creativity flourished during her university years, when she studied Art History, specializing in 20th Century clothing trends.

It was in school that she got the taste for creating clothing when she was asked to make costumes for the drama department.

This sparked her desire to create her own designs, so after she completed university she moved to the United States to study fashion design.

"When a woman puts on my clothes, I want her to feel as if she is enjoying one of life's great luxuries."

After graduating in 1998, Elise moved to New York where she worked for various fashion houses, slowly acquiring experience in buying and marketing.

Elise joined Madison's in 2007 to launch her first collection, which was inspired by her homeland.

The Petroika collection featured winter wear that was both fashionable and functional.

And now, her most recent endeavors have resulted in the new Heritage collection.

This line of evening wear has something for everyone, ranging from funky and free wheeling leather, to sensuous, sophisticated satins, and sequins.

Suits

Evening Sparkle Dress Collection Flash Video
Evening Sparkle Dress Collection
Luxurious Leathers

Exquisite leathers, chosen by master craftsmen, have been fashioned into a fun and funky line of evening wear. The leather is luxuriously soft and the designs are hot in our Hermitage Glamskin line.

Sequin Shine

Nothing sparkles up an evening like thousands of sequins on a classically designed gown. Check out the latest glamorous gowns in the Hermitage Metallica line, featuring sequins in gold, silver, bronze and steel blue.

Smooth Silks

If you're looking for an elegant look, one that's smooth and sexy, then you must see the Hermitage Gemstone collection. These silk and satin creations look sumptuous in a gemstone color palette that includes amethysts, emeralds, rubies and sapphires.

Aurora Style Guide

Browse through our Spring Style Guide to see some of the latest fashions and trends from hot designers around the world. Our Style Guide offers stylish fashion, classic design, and unrivalled quality -- there's something for everyone in the family!
